name: PERSONA3 THE MOVIE #4 Winter of Rebirth Theme Song CD Set
summary: This CD was part of a limited edition movie ticket set for Persona 3 the Movie #4 Winter of Rebirth. The set was sold exclusively on Jika Net Tanaka starting on October 28th, 2015 (shipping scheduled for December).
info:
• 中文名: 剧场版『PERSONA3 THE MOVIE #4 Winter of Rebirth』主题歌CD
  • 艺术家: 川村ゆみ
  • 厂牌: Aniplex
  • 发售日期: 2015-12-31
  • 碟片数量: 1
